testcase.name: Create User with correct name and phone
testcase.summary: Create User with correct name and phone
testcase.preconditions:
"Фамилия Имя" - no conditions.

"Телефон" - number is unique; numeric field; integers; min - 2 symbols and max - 14 symbols.

step.actions: Open the index. html on your desktop.
step.expectedresults: Оpen file: /// C: /Users/Marta/Desktop/Client/Client/index.html in the browser window.
You get the "Создание пользователя" with empty fields "Фамилия Имя" and "Телефон". End list "Роль".

step.actions: Еnter in the "Фамилия Имя" any letter.
step.expectedresults: The entered letters are displayed in the "Фамилия Имя".

step.actions: Enter in the "Телефон" symbols according to the conditions.
step.expectedresults: The entered symbols are displayed in the "Телефон".
New user is added and is displayed with the entered data.
